full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MDO SDE SNA TSOGS KYI SKOR, ,*, ,'PHAGS PA BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI YE SHES RGYAS PA'I MDO SDE RIN PO CHE MTHA' YAS PA MTHAR PHYIN ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @290A *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS DE SKAD CES BKA' STZAL PA DANG, TSE DANG LDAN PA MOOD GAL GYI BU CHEN PO BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA YID RANGS TE MNGON PAR BSTOD DO,, ,,'PHAGS PA BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI YE SHES RGYAS PA'I MDO SDE RIN PO CHE'I MTHAR PHYIN PA ZHES BYA BA THEG PA 'CHEN PO'I MDO, ,RDZOGS S+HO, ,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO PRA DZNY'A BAR MA DANG, LO TZTSA BA BANDE YE SHES SNYING POS BSGYUR, ,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO BI SHUDDHA SID HA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZTSA BA BAN DE DPAL BRTZEGS KYIS ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA, ,
